QuestData.Title: The Hammer and the Key
QuestData.Description: My Nemesis. Still lives.$BThe servants of fire still come.$BWe must pursue. Into their den.$B$BThe ogres know the way.$BSlay the Field Captains.$BRecover the Glyph of Opening.$B$BThis is the way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill a Twilight Field Captain and recover the Glyph of Opening.
QuestData.CompletionText: The glyph. Show it to me.
QuestData.RewardText: This power is ancient.$BPrimitive.$BEasy.$B$BWe will use it against them.
